Kevin Budiman

Researcher • Designer • Programmer

I am a UX Researcher and Designer with over two years of professional experience in mobile and enterprise industry. I am also a UCLIC alumni and I completed the MSc. in Human-Computer Interaction program in 2016. During my spare time, you can find me redesigning some websites or trekking along some Pacific Northwest mountains.
